Hello, my name is Max Mascini, and welcome to my personal website! <br>

I recently graduated from [Dalhousie University](https://dal.ca) (go tigers!) with first honours in neuroscience and a certificate in neurotechnology & innovation. <br>

I am currently working as a NeuroTech Programming Specialist at [SURGE Innovation](https://surgeinnovation.ca) and as a Research Assistant in the [NeuroCognitive Imaging Lab](https://www.ncilab.ca/) at Dalhousie University. <br>

Academically, I am interested in neurotechnology, brain-computer interfacing, data visualization, statistics, and machine learning, among other things. <br>

In my spare time, I love to go on extended backcountry backpacking and canoe trips with family and friends. If you have any reccomendations for places to go I would love to hear them :D <br>

### Job Experience

**NeuroTech Programming Specialist** | *SURGE Innovation* | June 2024 - Present <br>
- Running and creating programming for [SURGE's NeuroTech club](https://surge-neurotech-club.github.io/) <br>

**Research Assistant** | *NeuroCognitive Imaging Lab* | June 2024 - Present <br>
- Under PI Dr. Aaron Newman <br>
- Helping with various lab tasks: EEG recording, paradigm creation, teaching/overseeing undergraduate students data analysis, and running participants. <br>
